suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for ProjectCard Button Tooltips
suggestedTasks.description: Create comprehensive unit and integration tests for the newly added tooltips in the ProjectCard component. Verify tooltip text rendering, hover states, and accessibility attributes. Tests should cover different component scenarios and ensure consistent tooltip behavior across various project card states.
suggestedTasks.reason: Ensure reliability and maintainability of new tooltip functionality

suggestedTasks.title: Document Tooltip Design Pattern for Project Management UI
suggestedTasks.description: Create a comprehensive design document detailing the tooltip implementation approach used in the ProjectCard component. Include guidelines for tooltip text, styling, positioning, and accessibility considerations. This documentation will help maintain consistency across future UI components and aid in design system development.
suggestedTasks.reason: Establish clear design patterns for tooltip implementation

gotchas: Ensure tooltips are concise but informative
